__e: This is truly a feast for the nose.
Truly a man who can and will do anything:
I am truly a worse human being for knowing you.
Vera Cosgrove will be surely missed by her friends and grieving family, for she was indeed a fine woman, and everything a boy could wish for in a mother.

You know, there really are a million things I could tell you about Lily and Marshall, but really, the only thing you need to know is that ten years into their relationship, they still couldn't spend a single night apart.
Ah, it is a true honor to have you back in our presence.
I had 10.000 women and really can't remember all of them.
My dear General, I rarely say this, so please take it to heart when I say that, for the moment,
The others wouldn't want me telling you this, Harry but things aren't going at all well with the Order.
Truly, truly, I say to you, except a man be born of the water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter the Kingdom of God.
PAISIY: I tell you, we must strengthen our hearts.
Amen, I tell you on this day you shall be with me in paradise.
